about_the_game:
What you're in for!


It's 1863 and you, the player, are traveling through the small western town of Summerfair, deciding to stay a night at the local inn before continuing on your way. Explore the town, meet new people, and find out the secrets of this small town and its people!

The game has a cast of 7 dateable townspeople!


Magnolia, the dancer! A sweet woman who works at the saloon!
Florence, the sheriff from one town over, who visits the town on weekends.
Dijon, the shepherd, who guards the local sheep!
Jade, the bold farmhand with a cold exterior!
Will, the strange loner who frequents the woods!
Jak, the large brutish drunk!
Jed, Summerfair's tough sheriff!

Enjoy the intertwined and mesmerizing story, along with these features!


7 Dateable NPCs
Fishing Minigame (Arrow Drop)
Picking Berries
Over 30 Cooking Recipes
Catching Snakes Minigame (Snake)
Item Storage and Shopping
Complete Character customization including gender, pp parts, and more!
An outfit catalogue of over 60 custom outfits
Over 40 Achievements!

Contains over 60k words!

This game is intended for the player to experiment! Try new things! Have a good time and explore- Have fun :D This is not a typical dating sim!

Talk to the innkeeper and use code "beta" to unlock more outfits!

content_descriptors.notes:
Please keep this in mind, this game is not for the faint of heart and should be avoided if you are senstive to these topics.

Nsfw themes are toggleable, removing visual and descriptive depictions of sexual activity and heavy gore.

With Nsfw mode on, you will be exposed to:

Heavy: Gun Violence, Non-con, Sex, Death, Assault, Somnophilia, Human Remains, Kidnapping, Mugging, Assault, and Alcohol Use.

Light: Cannibalism, Drug Use, Implied Religious Themes, Implied Necrophilia, and BDSM.

Reminder, some of these things only happen once during specific routes, or with specific criteria to envoke a scene!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics

name: Courtin' Cowboys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics

short_description: It's 1863 and you, the player, are traveling through the small western town of Summerfair. Meet up to 7 love interests and discover their deliciously dark pasts... as well as their current horrifying misdeeds.
